statement:
Let $M$ be a complex manifold.

Suppose $\mathcal{F}$ is an analytic sheaf over $M$, that is a subsheaf
of $\mathcal{O}^k$. If $\mathcal{F}$ is a locally finitely generated
sheaf, then $\mathcal{F}$ is a coherent analytic sheaf.

[9]{} Lars Hörmander. [**]{}, North-Holland Publishing Company, New
York, New York, 1973. Steven G. Krantz. [**]{}, AMS Chelsea Publishing,
Providence, Rhode Island, 1992.
